greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of sum(k>=0, x^2^k/(1+x^2^k+x^2^(k+1))).
formula: a(2n) = a(n) + 1 - (n+1 mod 3), a(2n+1) = 1 - (n mod 3). - _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 27 2003
a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = (1 + (-1)^e)/2, a(3^e) = 0^e, a(p^e) = 1 if p == 1 (mod 6), a(p^e) = (-1)^e if p == 5 (mod 6). - _Michael Somos_, Jul 18 2004
G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2), A(x^4)) where f(u, v, w) = u^2 - v^2 + 2*w*(v-u) + w-v. - _Michael Somos_, Jul 18 2004
G.f.: Sum_{k>=0} f(x^2^k) where f(x) := x * (1 - x) / (1 - x^3). - _Michael Somos_, Jul 18 2004
max(sum(0<=k<=n,a(k))) = floor(log_4(n))+1. Proof by Nikolaus Meyberg.
Dirichlet g.f. (conjectured): L(chi_2(3),s)/(1-2^(-s)), with chi_2(3) the nontrivial Dirichlet character modulo 3. - _Ralf Stephan_, Mar 27 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[n < 1, 0, With[ {f = #/(1 + # + #^2) &}, SeriesCoefficient[ Sum[ f[x^2^k], {k, 0, Log[2, n]}], {x, 0, n}]]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 16 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A, m); if( n<1, 0, A = O(x); m=1; while( m<=n, m*=2; A = x / (1 + x + x^2) + subst(A, x, x^2)); polcoeff(A, n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 18 2004 */
(PARI) {a(n) = my(A, p, e); if( n<1, 0, A = factor(n); prod(k=1, matsize(A)[1], [p, e] = A[k,]; if( p==2, !(e%2), p==3, 0, kronecker( -12, p)^e)))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 16 2015 */
(PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, direuler( p=1, n, if( p==2, 1 / (1 - X^2), p==3, 1, 1 / (1 - kronecker( -12, p) * X)))[n])}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 16 2015 */
xref: Positions of 0 are in A084090, of 1 in A084089, of -1 in A084088, of a(n)!=0 in A084087.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, May 11 2003
